eg.projects

Class SettingsWin

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.SettingsWin

  • public class SettingsWin
extends java.lang.Object
    The window for the configuration of a project

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • basicWindow

        public static SettingsWin basicWindow(java.lang.String fileLabel)
        Returns a new SettingsWin where only the name for a project file and for a project root can be entered
        Parameters:
        fileLabel - the label for the file text field
        Returns:
        a new SettingsWin

      • adaptableWindow

        public static SettingsWin adaptableWindow(java.lang.String fileLabel)
        Returns a new SettingsWin whose content is set up afterwards by choosing from the methods that add input options.

        The method setupWindow() must be invoked (lastly) to initialize the window. Calling only this method yields a SettingsWin that equals to a basicWindow(String).

        Parameters:
        fileLabel - the label for the file text field
        Returns:
        a new SettingsWin

        Returns:
